content: Messenger apps are the new distribution platform, and with that thinking, bots are new vehicles for a product. We have “mobile first” companies, and soon, we’ll have “bot-first” companies. Case in point? Statsbot. Bots are a new expression of a product’s value. https://medium.com/mixpanel-s-the-signal/your-next-coworker-will-be-a-bot-and-thats-okay-e15c604244a6#.rqilpzpyi
